subject: Basketball
Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
lead_paragraph: Ed Weiland, a contributor to HoopsAnalyst.com, examined Jeremy Lin’s college career and concluded that he might be among the best point guards in the 2010 N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Ed Weiland, a contributor to HoopsAnalyst.com, examined Jeremy Lin’s college career and concluded that he might be among the best point guards in the 2010 N.B.A. draft.
